verbs.description: [V: According] to CNN : Washington ( CNN ) Former NBA star Dennis Rodman is traveling to Singapore for the upcoming summit between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un . Rodman 's agent , Darren Prince , confirmed the trip . ...
